name: Flying Aces
description:
Flying Aces is the first true dogfight Combat Flight Simulator for the iPhone and iPod Touch. Sit in the cockpit of an F-15 Eagle and take off from the USS Eisenhower or from the desert airbase at Fightertown USA. Flying over the Persian Gulf, you will fly head to head against enemy warplanes. Your mission is to shoot down as many enemy warplanes as possible and return to base. Should you need to reload, you may also return to base and land where your crew will automatically reload your plane with ammo and get you ready for more action.

More Action:

* "Dogfight AI" that puts you in the center of the action!
* Take Off and Landing - Now you can take off and land on either an Aircraft Carrier or Desert Airbase
* Removed in-air pickups - Now simply return to base and land to reload
* Pause & Resume Game
* F-15 starts game fully armed
* Increased missile speeds.- Extra Life awarded every 10 waves

Better Controls:

* Screen Calibration Options
* Game Control Sensitivity and other options

Better Visual & Audio Feedback:

* Outstanding graphics and special effects!
* 3D Stereo Audio Effects!
* Realistic enemy fly-by sounds
* Enemy planes are now easier to spot
* Enemy health bars
* Enemy plane begins smoking when hit
* Larger HUD font for Ammo, Kills and Waves
* Game Help Screen
* In-Game Training Alerts


SUPPORT:
Visit our site and vote for the next set of features and to discuss the game in our forums.

Please tell your friends about Flying Aces and SnakeHead Software.
